name: Orin Doomhammer
text: Decent regular pizza, sadly the white sauce was a tad bland, but the chicken topping was fantastic by far the best part of the pizza. Great friendly service and a very nice dinning room. Prices are a tad steep but in this climate who's isn't. Thank you for being so friendly and warm I will return, and do recommend it.

name: redstone1011 tm
text: This is an excellent place for families! They have large tables in the game room area, which is great for parties or get togethers. Lots of arcade games , great selection of food and beverages. Highly recommend this place to everyone!

name: Branden Bradley
text: Wonderful staff and even better üçï!!!!

name: Aom Chandler
text: their pizza is different in a good way. family likes twisted bread and bbq chicken too.

name: Deborah Barkley
text: Been going to the pro since I was like six, still my favorite pizza place

name: Caitlyn Cline
text: Always great. Super nice folks and retro games!

name: Megan Singh
text: Pro is everything a pizza joint should be. Good pizza and breadsticks, an arcade (and music machine) nearby and friendly staff! Always enjoy my experience, whether dining in or taking to go!

name: melanie mollman
text: Excellent pizza!

name: Roy Brownlee
text: Hours are random. Very rude staff. Was freezing cold out in the middle of a winter and because we got a coffee from another place they wouldn't let us in to eat until we got rid of the coffee's. On top of that we had our 6 month old with ‚Ä¶More

name: Clayton Quinnell
text: The best Pizza in Havre, no doubt. The price is a little higher than other places in town, but it is definitely worth it. There is two different sections to the restaurant, one side is a family atmosphere with arcade games. The other side ‚Ä¶More

name: Scott A Seigel
text: Nice pizzeria. The pizza is good. The other items are too. It's family oriented and clean. There are arcade machines. They even have an espresso bar. We go here fairly regularly.

name: jason petty
text: Best pie in town! Great beer selection and some good entertaining arcade games for the kids.

name: Sherry P
text: Was there for a birthday party with a hockey group of over 30 people. Service was great and so was the food and people that took care of our huge party.Will go back when we are in Harve,Montana  again.

name: Chaz Earthboy
text: Always enjoy myself and the food

name: Caleb Hutchins
text: Pretty good thin-crust pizza and hot wings. An arcade area is great for kids, and a more "grown-up" dining area is nice and quiet for adults. Nice downtown location, also offers delivery, and serves beer and wine.

name: Jennifer Tilleman
text: Great service, amazing food, and a nice atmosphere! I especially like that there are two distinct seating areas. One that is fun and family friendly with various arcade games, and one that is a bit more refined for just mom and dad or a friendly gathering. They have a diversified menu; not just pizza... Also wine and beer on tap!!

name: Judi Dugan
text: Really nice place. Clean and open. First time I've ever had a Taco Pizza without tortilla chips on it but it was really good. Thanks

name: Mr Darrius
text: They legit have the best pizza in Havre.

name: Ashley Vande Kop
text: If I could give 6 stars I would.  Great low carb pizza options.  They have an amazing cauliflower pizza crust and a very good tasting low carb crust option as well.  I'm so glad to find lower carb pizza options that taste great!  They found a new regular customer tonight!

name: Joshua Gomez
text: Always good food.  Great beer selection.

name: Nicklous Florence
text: I have had their rolls which were amazing. This establishment is a nice place to eat. If I wasn't a broke college kid I would eat here more often. Personally I love the fact the owner knows the reviewers with the bad reviews, calling them ‚Ä¶More

name: Alison Dean
text: I love their breadsticks!! They are the BEST! Their pizza is garbage, but its worklth going to that place just for the breadsticks!

name: Taylor Dutton
text: Good pizza.

name: James Malley
text: Great place to bring your family and enjoy games and pizza. Also have beer and wine for the patents!

name: Pamela L.
text: The Pro  has absolutely great Taco Pizza,( a family favorite)prompt service and delivery, on a cold winter night. Thanks Bruce, Marlys and Crew!

name: Julie Welsh
text: The best pizza and breadstick in 2 counties! Always friendly staff and very clean. Great service!

name: Trevor Marks
text: Food is mediocre and overpriced but the owners are absolutely miserable. The atmosphere and location are superb yet the business is always slow and help is always wanted, and I can guess as to why. The owners are terribly cheap, over charge ‚Ä¶More

name: Emily Allison
text: Family friendly with great food and friendly service.

name: Casey M
text: Pretty good place their cheese sticks are the best

name: Jason Cech
text: Light atmosphere. Feels very cheery and happy here. Great place to bring the kids!

name: Brent Rush
text: EVEN better than pizza hut

name: Micheal McCuen
text: Amazing owners good atmosphere and great food

name: Frank Benjamin
text: Great selection of tap local beers. Good pizza, better sandwiches. local owner cares that cares about his product.

name: Bo Waterworth
text: Love this place! Cheese sticks are amazing, and I love the subs!

name: Lisa Becker
text: Customer service is HORRIBLE. Will not be giving you my business anymore!

name: Kevin Hoversland
text: The owners are great, and food is excellent.

name: Todd Shipp
text: Great pizza and really good salads plenty to eat There

name: Kateri Helgeson
text: Good little joint however the staff is extremely rude here and there.

name: Kids will be Kids
text: This place has totally redeemed it self to me! I need to realize that everyone is allowed to have a bad day !! Truth is, I love their food And by far the cleanest bathrooms in town!

name: Raymond Campbell
text: Very, very, very, very awesome pizza. The only thing that I hate about it is the prices. If you have the cash, go here!

name: Steven James
text: The food is enjoyable the service could use some work, I went there to celebrate with family and they seemed very abrasive towards minorities
